    Voice and Data Systems are crucial to the success or failure of most businesses. Many companies provide laptops, cell phones, and Internet connections that require expensive maintenance by internal IT departments. 

    However, paying for full-time IT services and multiple telecom providers may be an aoverlooked and unnecessary expense. A no cost analysis of these computer support and telecomm unication expenses can save companies money.
